title: Walking in Paris - the speaker uses a simile to

content.question: In line 14 (“and learn...lines”), the speaker uses a simile to

choices.label: describe Nana as a young woman
emphasize the importance of hard work
evoke a sense of deep passion and commitment

content.answer: evoke a sense of deep passion and commitment

skill.text: Skill 6.A: Identify and explain the function of a simile.
